rules.surveyText:
[ASK IF S2=6 OR 7]

S2a. In what type of doctors office do you work?
rules.plainTextRule: Only respondents who selected S2 = 6 (Nurse Practitioner) OR S2 = 7 (Physician's Assistant) are asked S2a.
rules.conditionDescription: Respondent must have answered S2 = 6 or S2 = 7.

rules.surveyText:
[ASK IF S2=1]

S3a. What type of Cardiologist are you primarily?
rules.plainTextRule: Only respondents who selected S2 = 1 (Cardiologist) are asked S3a.

rules.surveyText:
[ASK IF S2=1-5]

S4. Are you currently board certified or eligible in your specialty?
rules.plainTextRule: Only respondents who selected S2 = 1, 2, 3, 4 or 5 (Cardiologist; Internal Medicine/GP/Primary Care/Family Practice; Nephrologist; Endocrinologist; Lipidologist) are asked S4.
rules.conditionDescription: Respondent must have answered S2 in the range 1-5.

rules.surveyText:
A3a. For each treatment, approximately what % of those LAST 100 patients received that therapy in addition to a statin vs. without a statin? Each row must add to 100%.

RANDOMIZE IN SAME ORDER AS A3. ONLY SHOW THERAPY WHERE A3>0
rules.plainTextRule: Within A3a, show each therapy row only for therapies that the respondent indicated they prescribed in A3 (i.e., only show the therapy row if the corresponding A3 value > 0).
rules.conditionDescription: Show each row only when the corresponding therapy's count from A3 is greater than 0 (A3 > 0).

rules.surveyText:
A3b. For each treatment you just indicated that you prescribe without a statin, approximately what % of those patients who received that therapy without a statin did so…

ONLY SHOW ROWS FOR WHICH A3a COL B > 0

RANDOMIZE IN SAME ORDER AS A3
rules.plainTextRule: Within A3b, show each therapy row only for therapies where in A3a the 'Without a statin' column (Column B) is greater than 0.
rules.conditionDescription: Show each row only when the respondent's A3a 'Without a statin' percentage for that therapy (A3a Col B) is > 0.

rules.surveyText:
A4a. For each treatment, for approximately what % of those NEXT 100 patients would you expect to prescribe that therapy in addition to a statin vs. without a statin? Each row must add to 100%.

RANDOMIZE IN SAME ORDER AS A3. ONLY SHOW THERAPY WHERE A4>0
rules.plainTextRule: Within A4a, show each therapy row only for therapies that the respondent indicated they would prescribe in A4 (i.e., only show the therapy row if the corresponding A4 value > 0).
rules.conditionDescription: Show each row only when the corresponding therapy's count from A4 is greater than 0 (A4 > 0).

rules.surveyText:
A4b. For each treatment you just indicated that you would expect to prescribe without a statin, approximately what % of those patients who would receive that therapy without a statin would do so…

ONLY SHOW ROWS FOR WHICH A4a COL B > 0

RANDOMIZE IN SAME ORDER AS A3
rules.plainTextRule: Within A4b, show each therapy row only for therapies where in A4a the 'Without a statin' column (Column B) is greater than 0.
rules.conditionDescription: Show each row only when the respondent's A4a 'Without a statin' percentage for that therapy (A4a Col B) is > 0.

rules.surveyText:
ASK IF PRESCRIBING IN A4 is > or < A3 FOR ROWS 2, 3, OR 4 (LEQVIO, REPATHA, OR PRALUENT)

A5. How quickly might you expect to change your prescribing of PCSK9 inhibitors based on this indication change? _Select one_
rules.plainTextRule: Ask A5 only if the respondent's expected prescribing in A4 is different (greater or less) than their past prescribing in A3 for any of rows 2, 3, or 4 (Leqvio, Repatha, or Praluent).
rules.conditionDescription: Respondent must have A4 value <> A3 value for at least one of the therapies in rows 2, 3, or 4 (Leqvio, Repatha, Praluent).

rules.surveyText:
[ASK IF S2=2]

B5. How would you describe your specialty/training? Select all that apply.
rules.plainTextRule: Only respondents who selected S2 = 2 (Internal Medicine / General Practitioner / Primary Care / Family Practice) are asked B5.
